summary: 该接口拥有恢复RDS实例的某些数据库或表到原实例。

schema.description: 用于保证请求的幂等性，防止重复提交请求。由客户端生成该参数值，要保证在不同请求间唯一，最大值不超过64个ASCII字符，且该参数值中不能包含非ASCII字符。

备份集ID。您可以通过DescribeBackups接口获取备份集列表。

>**BackupId**和**RestoreTime**两者至少传入一个。
备份保留周期内的任意时间点。格式：yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ（UTC时间）。 > * **BackupId**和**RestoreTime**两者至少传入一个。 > * 实例必须已开启[日志备份](~~98818~~)。

指定恢复的库表。格式：
```[{"type":"db","name":"<数据库1名称>","newname":"<新数据库1名称>","tables":[{"type":"table","name":"<数据库1内的表1名称>","newname":"<新的表1名称>"},{"type":"table","name":"<数据库1内的表2名称>","newname":"<新的表2名称>"}]},{"type":"db","name":"<数据库2名称>","newname":"<新数据库2名称>","tables":[{"type":"table","name":"<数据库2内的表3名称>","newname":"<新的表3名称>"},{"type":"table","name":"<数据库2内的表4名称>","newname":"<新的表4名称>"}]}]```

是否开启极速库表恢复。取值：
* **true**：开启
* **false**：关闭

>关于极速库表恢复的更多信息，请参见[恢复库表](~~103175~~)。

400.errorMessage: Specified restore type is not valid.
Specified restore time is not valid.
Specified bakset is not valid.
Invalid parameter TableMeta is null or not json format
BakHistory is inbalid when check restore TableMeta
BakTableMeta in BakHistory.Info is invalid
TableMeta has duplicate db.table in newname or with common.
TableMeta has duplicate db or table with other newname, commons or system
specific source restore dbname is not found in db list
new dbname or table in TableMeta cannot be same with old when restore to source instance
Specified DB name already exists in the This instance.
Specified parameters is not valid.
Specified AvZone is not valid.
Specified Region is not valid.
Specified ip is not valid.
Specified VPCId VSwitchId or IPAddress or TunnelId is not valid.
The request is missing a user_id parameter.
The request is missing a uid parameter.
Both BackupSet and RestoreTime are null.
db version of bakhistory is mismatch with custins
The disk size is not enough to restore tables.
specified source category is not supported for this function.
RestoreTable Exception, result is null.
At most 100 tables are supported. Restoring the database is recommended.
A package instance is not allowed to operate independently.
Pricing plan price result not found.
You have not passed the real-name authentication and do not meet the purchase conditions. Please log in to the user center for real-name authentication.

403.errorMessage: Current backup log enable status does not support this operation.
Current DB instance type does not support this operation.
Current DB instance state does not support this operation.
Current backup set method does not support operations.
Current backup set state does not support operations.
Current DB instance had child instance.

404.errorMessage: The available backup does not exist in recovery time.
The available binlog does not exist in recovery time.
Specified backup set ID does not exist.
Specified db does not exist or DB status does not support.
Specified Region does not exist in RDS.
There is insufficient capacity available for the requested instance.
Specified instance does not exist or not support.

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to resource config error.

title: 恢复RDS实例的某些数据库或表到原实例
description:
### 适用引擎
RDS MySQL

### 相关功能文档
><notice>使用该接口前，请仔细阅读功能文档，确保完全了解使用接口的前提条件及使用后造成的影响后，再进行操作。></notice>

[恢复库表](~~103175~~)
